trans-unit.source: Specifies that a data member is a SOAP message header.
trans-unit.target: 指定数据成员是 SOAP 消息头。

trans-unit.source: The MessageHeaderAttribute attribute allows you to map fields and properties of a type marked with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute> attribute to SOAP message headers.
trans-unit.target: MessageHeaderAttribute 属性允许你使用标记的类型的字段和属性映射<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute>属性设为 SOAP 消息头。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The field or property can be of a simple type or a composite type that can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 字段或属性可以是简单类型或可序列化的复合类型。

trans-unit.source: For information on controlling the serialization of the contents of a SOAP body without modifying the default SOAP envelope itself, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>, [Specifying Data Transfer in Service Contracts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Using Data Contracts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 在不修改默认 SOAP 信封本身的情况下控制 SOAP 正文内容序列化的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>，[指定服务协定中的数据传输](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[使用数据协定](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating message contracts, see [Using Message Contracts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建消息协定的详细信息，请参阅[使用消息协定](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP standard defines the following attributes that can exist on a header: - `Actor` or `Role` (`Actor` in SOAP 1.1, `Role` in SOAP 1.2) - `MustUnderstand` - `Relay` The `Actor` or `Role` attribute specifies the URI of the node for which a given header is intended.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 标准定义上一个标头可以存在的以下属性:-`Actor`或`Role`(`Actor` SOAP 1.1 中`Role`SOAP 1.2 中)- `MustUnderstand` - `Relay` `Actor`或`Role`属性指定给定标头所针对的节点的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The `MustUnderstand` attribute specifies whether the header understands the node processing.
trans-unit.target: `MustUnderstand`特性指定标头是否理解节点的处理。

trans-unit.source: The `Relay` attribute specifies whether the header is to be relayed to downstream nodes.
trans-unit.target: `Relay`属性指定此标头是否要中继至下游节点。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] does not perform any processing of these attributes on incoming messages, except for the `MustUnderstand` attribute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]不执行任何处理传入消息，这些特性除外`MustUnderstand`属性。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, read and write these attributes, even though they are not sent by default.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以读取和写入这些属性，即使它们不会发送默认情况下也是如此。

trans-unit.source: You can set the attribute values in two ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过两种方式来设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: First, you can change the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.MustUnderstand%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Relay%2A> properties on the MessageHeaderAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 首先，你可以更改<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A>，<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.MustUnderstand%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Relay%2A>MessageHeaderAttribute 上的属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Relay%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.MustUnderstand%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A>

trans-unit.source: (There is no `Role` property – set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A> property and `Role` is passed if SOAP 1.2 is used).
trans-unit.target: (没有任何`Role`设置属性 –<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A>属性和`Role`如果使用 SOAP 1.2 传递)。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] The second way to control these attributes is by making the desired header type the type parameter of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> class and using the resulting type together with the MessageHeaderAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ [!code-cs [XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent) ]控制这些属性的第二个方法是通过使类型的类型参数所需标头<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>类和使用生成的类型以及 MessageHeaderAttribute。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> properties programmatically to set the SOAP attributes.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>属性以编程方式设置这些 SOAP 特性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>

trans-unit.source: For example: [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] If both the dynamic and the static control mechanisms are used, the static settings are the default but can be overridden using the dynamic mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ [!code-cs [XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)][!code-cs[XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent) ]如果使用动态和静态控制机制，则静态设置为默认值，但可以使用动态机制重写。

trans-unit.source: For example: [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] Creating repeated headers with dynamic attribute control is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ [!code-cs [XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)][!code-cs[XpsCreate #XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent) ]允许创建具有动态属性控制的重复标头。

trans-unit.source: For example: ``` [MessageHeaderArray] public MessageHeader<Person> documentApprovers[]; ``` On the receiving side, reading these SOAP attributes can only be done if the generic <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> class is used.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰``` [MessageHeaderArray] public MessageHeader<Person> documentApprovers[]; ```在接收端，读取这些 SOAP 属性仅可完成如果泛型<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>使用类。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Actor%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Relay%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.MustUnderstand%2A> properties of a header of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> type to discover the attribute settings on the received message.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Actor%2A>，<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Relay%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.MustUnderstand%2A>属性标头的<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>要发现对收到的消息上的属性设置类型。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.MustUnderstand%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Relay%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601.Actor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a message is received and then sent back, the SOAP attribute settings only roundtrip for headers of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601> type.
trans-unit.target: 当接收到消息，然后发回，SOAP 属性设置唯一往返的标头<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>类型。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeader%601>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 URI，指示此标头为目标处的节点。

trans-unit.source: Maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 映射到角色标头属性时使用 SOAP 1.2，而使用 SOAP 1.1 时参与者标头属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute> for details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>有关详细信息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A URI that indicates the node at which this header is targeted.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，指示此标头为目标处的节点。

trans-unit.source: This URI maps to the role header attribute when SOAP 1.2 is used and the actor header attribute when SOAP 1.1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 1.1 时，此 URI 将映射到角色标头属性时使用 SOAP 1.2 和参与者标头属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the node acting in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*> role must understand this header.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在起作用的节点<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*>角色必须理解此标头。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*>

trans-unit.source: This is mapped to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这将映射到<xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> SOAP 标头属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute> for details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>有关详细信息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > It is important to remember that if the MustUnderstand property is `true` in a message being sent and the application on the receiving side does not understand the header a fault is generated.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 务必请记住，如果 MustUnderstand 属性为`true`发送和接收端上的应用程序不理解的标头，则将生成错误消息中。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if a header with the `mustUnderstand` SOAP header attribute set to `true` is received by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], it must be a part of the message contract (or must be processed by one of the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channels); otherwise, it is assumed that the header is not understood and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果具有的标头`mustUnderstand`SOAP 标头属性设置为`true`由接收[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，它必须是消息协定的一部分 (或必须由之一处理[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]通道); 否则为它假定无法理解标头，并引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node acting in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*> role must understand this header; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在起作用的节点<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*>角色必须理解此标头; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute.Actor*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this header is to be relayed to downstream nodes.
trans-unit.target: 指定此标头是否要中继至下游节点。

trans-unit.source: This is mapped to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_relay" name="relay" href=""></xref> SOAP header attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这将映射到<xref uid="langword_csharp_relay" name="relay" href=""> </xref> SOAP 标头属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored when SOAP 1.1 is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SOAP 1.1 时，将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute> for details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>有关详细信息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this header is to be relayed to downstream nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此标头中继至下游节点;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
